Library research at the University of Lancaster .A Mackenzie, A.G. Reference has been made to work done at the University of Lancaster in recent issues of the RECORD:  this article  summarizes past, present and possible future activities in this field. .X 4	1	915 5	1	915 9	1	915 207	1	915 222	1	915 223	1	915 288	1	915 291	1	915 292	1	915 296	1	915 297	1	915 298	1	915 300	1	915 301	1	915 302	1	915 358	1	915 359	1	915 364	1	915 515	1	915 535	1	915 591	1	915 625	1	915 629	1	915 631	1	915 634	1	915 791	1	915 811	1	915 816	1	915 818	1	915 823	1	915 843	1	915 844	1	915 846	1	915 865	1	915 915	6	915 925	2	915 957	1	915 959	1	915 960	1	915 961	5	915 962	2	915 964	1	915 972	1	915 984	1	915 994	1	915 1015	1	915 1219	1	915 1242	1	915 1247	1	915 1268	1	915 1353	1	915 1354	1	915 1386	1	915 1400	1	915 1401	2	915 1401	2	915
